name: Cloudy Eclipse
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 42: Running Out Of Space

You've taken your ship out for a nice jaunt into deep space when you happen upon an evil cloud! It keeps spreading and spreading, and it's left parts of itself everywhere. Do you have what it takes to defeat the evil menace?

Keyboard Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
WASD - Fire
Q/E - Change Weapons

Joystick Controls: 
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Fire
Shoulder Buttons - Change Weapons
